start:
Hello there!

We noticed that you've been working hard and enjoying some code automation 👨‍💻

So, we thought about sharing some insights of your week's usage 📊
end:
Looks like you had a busy week working with our tools & services. Book a Demo right now to learn what more you can do with our platform 👌.


Have a Great Day! 😇


User Experience Manager,

Maham Shahid

subject: Your weekly usage update from APIMatic
outlineText: We noticed that you're loving our service 😍. Here's some insights 😃
